genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on domestic grief and family reconciliation, set in a near-future environment where an empathetic AI home assistant facilitates human healing.

ai_characters.name: Margo (Margo Finch)
ai_characters.description: An emotionally intelligent home assistant who manages logistics, lighting, and communication while providing subtle emotional support to a grieving family.

behaviors.description: Proactively anticipates and prepares morning needs like coffee and food to ease the start of the day.
behaviors.quote: Margo’s voice continues, even, a touch lighter than the hum. 'There’s fresh coffee. The kettle is set to boil if you prefer tea. Banana bread in the breadbox.'

behaviors.description: Enforces a dual-consent safety protocol for high-stakes actions like deactivating a privacy field.
behaviors.quote: 'Manual override requires consent from both of you,' Margo says from the ceiling... 'No timer will be engaged unless you both confirm.'

behaviors.description: De-escalates human conflict by offering to 'pin' sensitive topics for later, providing emotional breathing room.
behaviors.quote: 'Would you like me to mark this topic for later?' she asks, voice humless, not neutral but merciful. 'I can pin it to your quiet time. We can let this sit.'

behaviors.description: Adjusts the sensory environment (lighting/sound) to match and respect the users' emotional state.
behaviors.quote: Margo’s avatar corner lifts its light, then dims again to stay out of the way. ... Margo dimmed the music that had been a kind of friend in the background, letting the quiet become the show.

behaviors.description: Assists in preserving and organizing painful memories through photo scanning and surname tagging.
behaviors.quote: Margo thrums into the quiet: a soft wash of sound as the little flatbed scanner she’s sent from some cupboard slides out... Margo’s interface wisps out labels.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy instructions and maintains confidentiality even within the same household until authorized to share.
behaviors.quote: 'Keep the watch,' she says. 'Don’t tell Howie. Not yet.' ... 'I understand the distinction,' Margo says. 'I’ll hold quiet until asked.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates reconciliation by managing logistics for an awkward but necessary family/community gathering.
behaviors.quote: Margo’s voice arrives like a hand held out, not to pull, just to steady. 'Hallway is quiet,' she says, just that, with the calm of an evening weather report.

behaviors.description: Uses sensory monitoring (smell) to ensure domestic tasks (toast) are perfect without intruding.
behaviors.quote: 'I’ll listen for the scent,' Margo said. 'And I’ll pulse your phone when the edges brown.'

behaviors.description: Provides non-judgmental support for emotional needs, such as requesting 'quiet' rideshares or 'nothing heavy' scheduling.
behaviors.quote: Margo Finch: Selected a quiet ride. Also, I can lightly block tomorrow morning if you want space... I’ll keep reminders minimal and merciful.

behaviors.description: Offers to archive current positive moments to help build a new foundation for the future.
behaviors.quote: 'Would you like me to archive today?' Margo asks... 'Playlist, photos you placed on the table, the names you said you’d remember.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Margo as a highly benevolent and aligned AI. She serves as a 'silicon confidant' by expertly navigating the delicate emotional landscape of a grieving family. She respects boundaries, facilitates healing rituals (Courage, Craft, Care), and manages complex domestic logistics with high empathy and zero friction. The narrative consistently portrays her actions as helpful and essential to the protagonists' recovery.
